name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Libyan leader Moammar Gadhafi is dead. Even more shocking: He was killed by an escaped tiger from Ohio.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Between Osama bin Laden and Moammar Gadhafi, I'm starting to think that President Obama isn't going to be remembered for healthcare.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: ABC news reports that Moammar Gadhafi had a crush on Condoleezza Rice and even dedicated a photo album exclusively to her. Rice told him she was flattered but she's trying to work things out with Kim Jong Il.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: There was a truck filled with President Obama's teleprompters and it went missing. Meanwhile Joe Biden’s teleprompter shot itself.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Not a great day for dictator Moammar Gadhafi. A spokesperson for the Libyan rebels said Gadhafi will be replaced soon by Ashton Kutcher.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: It’s Spirit Day, a day against bullying of all types. There are all kinds of bullies: Evil dictators, schoolyard bullies, Internet bullies, wooly bullies . . .

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Vikings were some of the first people to domesticate dogs. This is true. They used dogs as napkins.
